001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
007import org.bitcoinj.core.TransactionOutput;
008import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
009
010import java.util.Collections;
011import java.util.List;
012
013/**
014 * Simple implementation of SigningRequest
015 */
016public class DefaultSigningRequest implements SigningRequest {
017    private final Network network;
018    private final List<TransactionInputData> inputs;
019    private final List<TransactionOutputData> outputs;
020
021
022    @Deprecated
023    public DefaultSigningRequest(String networkId, List<TransactionInputData> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
024        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(networkId).orElseThrow(IllegalArgumentException::new), inputs, outputs);
025    }
026
027    public DefaultSigningRequest(Network network, List<TransactionInputData> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
028        this.network = network;
029        this.inputs = Collections.unmodifiableList(inputs);
030        this.outputs = Collections.unmodifiableList(outputs);
031    }
032
033    @Deprecated
034    public DefaultSigningRequest(Network network, TransactionInputData input) {
035        this(network, Collections.singletonList(input), Collections.emptyList());
036    }
037
038    @Deprecated
039    public DefaultSigningRequest(Network network) {
040        this(network, Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList());
041    }
042
043    @Deprecated
044    public DefaultSigningRequest(NetworkParameters netParams, List<TransactionInputData> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
045        this(netParams.network(), inputs, outputs);
046    }
047
048    @Deprecated
049    public DefaultSigningRequest(NetworkParameters netParams, TransactionInputData input) {
050        this(netParams, Collections.singletonList(input), Collections.emptyList());
051    }
052
053    @Deprecated
054    public DefaultSigningRequest(NetworkParameters netParams) {
055        this(netParams.network(), Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList());
056    }
057
058    @Deprecated
059    public DefaultSigningRequest(String networkId) {
060        this(BitcoinNetwork.fromIdString(networkId).orElseThrow(IllegalArgumentException::new), Collections.emptyList(), Collections.emptyList());
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public Network network() {
065        return network;
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    @Deprecated
070    public String networkId() {
071        return network.id();
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public List<TransactionInputData> inputs() {
076        return inputs;
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public List<TransactionOutputData> outputs() {
081        return outputs;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * bitcoinj signing uses (currently) mutable transaction objects, this
086     * convenience method will create one if you want to use bitcoinj to sign this request.
087     * @return an unsigned bitcoinj transaction
088     */
089    public Transaction toUnsignedTransaction() {
090        NetworkParameters params = NetworkParameters.of(network);
091        Transaction utx = new Transaction(params);
092        this.inputs().forEach(in ->
093                utx.addInput(in.toOutPoint(network).getHash(),
094                        in.toOutPoint(network).getIndex(),
095                        ScriptBuilder.createEmpty()));
096        this.outputs().forEach(out ->
097                utx.addOutput(new TransactionOutput(params,
098                        utx,
099                        out.amount(),
100                        out.scriptPubKey().getProgram())));
101        return utx;
102    }
103}
